content: Goal: Save $20,000 for medical school by the time I start in July/August (!) and make my 2017 contribution to my IRA Savings: January 2017: $14,331 (I used my savings to make a lump-sum IRA contribution, so I’ll spend the spring/summer building the savings back up) February 2017: $15,493 IRA: January 2017: $11,000 DONE :) Feb 2017: Still done!
